column4: i have multiple rar files in one directory,  i try rar e *.rar   , but it does nto extract anything,  it works if i do rar e fullrarname.rar  , but not *.rar
i gues si will use find langauge again
okay thanks
boohab, that is C language or bash?
bash
my other problem is that i cannot save dvdrebuilder project files under wine, but i guess there is no way aroudn that, so i have to use that program with windows or backup dvds one at a time
it gives me this error when trying to save project files:  rr:seh:setup_exception_record stack overflow 1324 bytes in thread 0009 eip 7bc3c7de esp 00230e04 stack 0x230000-0x231000-0x330000
johnneylee, dvdrebuilder   re-encodes dvd9 dvds to dvd5   by using CCE ... the best quality encoder currently
isnt CCE not free?
cce is not free, no
i could notice a major difference between cce encoding/dvdrebuilder and   plain old dvdshrink, and i reckon   k9copy and dvd95 are similar to dvdshrink
don't like dvdshrink?
dvdshrink is nice but it gives very poor quality video
What's the proposed alternative -- I really didn't know there was one.  I use DVDShrink a lot -- maybe b/c its very easy :)
I'm open to any alternative to dvdshrink -- however buying the CCE -- very expensive for me
dvdrebuilder with CCE is the best quality
How much did the CCE run you?
i am running the trial edition
Doesn't trial edition have some limitations or time limit?  I thought to purchase the CCE it was like $1K
i don't talk about piracy or support of it
I'm not talking about piracy -- far from it -- I guess I just asked how much the CCE was going to run?  Not sure how that relates to piracy??
